item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (98 points | 62 comments)
2. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (31 points | 8 comments)
3. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (24 points | 1 comment)
4. Continuous Integration Dashboard for Apache NuttX RTOS (Prometheus and Grafana) (33 points | discuss)
5. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (98 points | 20 comments)
6. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (372 points | 106 comments)
7. Establishing an etiquette for LLM use on Libera.Chat (19 points | 10 comments)
8. CDC Confirms H5N1 Bird Flu Infection in California Child: First Child Case in US (76 points | 50 comments)
9. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (71 points | 31 comments)
10. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (19 points | 2 comments)
11. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (19 points | 1 comment)
12. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (11 points | discuss)
13. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (131 points | 31 comments)
14. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (133 points | 18 comments)
15. The Physics of Butterfly Wings (33 points | 7 comments)
16. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (268 points | 59 comments)
17. Music as Language (2019) [pdf] (25 points | 3 comments)
18. Energy is frame-dependent, infrastructure of energy is frame-independent (2020) (7 points | 3 comments)
19. A silly science prize changed my career (88 points | 9 comments)
20. MaXX Interactive Desktop -- the little brother of the great SGI Desktop on IRIX (139 points | 55 comments)
21. Wordpress.org released Secure Custom Fields "PRO" version with ACF pro features (38 points | 24 comments)
22. Baby’s Second Garbage Collector (117 points | discuss)
23. Dear sir, you have built a compiler (2022) (328 points | 186 comments)
24. Computer Networking Fundamentals – Learning Series (2023) (122 points | 10 comments)
25. 9elements Takes over Intel 1st Gen Xeon Scalable Skylake Support Within Coreboot (36 points | 2 comments)
26. Alloy Automation (YC W20) Is Hiring ( | hide)
27. How to give a senior leader feedback (without getting fired) (128 points | 133 comments)
28. Writes Large Correct Programs (2008) (121 points | 82 comments)
29. An Idaho County Will Publish Everyone's Ballots to Combat Mistrust (3 points | 1 comment)
30. Reverse engineers bust sleazy gig work platform (87 points | 10 comments)
